table.name: vtiger_tourprices
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_tourprices` ( `tourpricesid` int(19) NOT NULL, `name` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `tourpricesno` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `date_start` date DEFAULT NULL, `date_end` date DEFAULT NULL, `tp_status` varchar(255) DEFAULT '', `tp_price` decimal(16,8) DEFAULT NULL, `tp_ezz` decimal(16,8) DEFAULT NULL, `tags` varchar(1) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`tourpricesid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_tourpricescf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_tourpricescf` ( `tourpricesid` int(19) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`tourpricesid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
